item.title: Kaggle:Introduction to Manual Feature Engineering その1
item.description: https://www.kaggle.com/willkoehrsen/introduction-to-manual-feature-engineering I thought it was better to take a note of what I was doing. Qiita says that memos are OK, so write it down here. It’s complicated to think of combining various tables in this Notebook, Just group by client_id and count, and add that line to application_train to increase the feature quantity, It’s easy to think. But I wonder if this KDE plot is useful in many places.
